conversion_verification.notes: The conversion is a high-quality isometric cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent treatment of 3D geometry; walls have clear thickness and height.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout is highly faithful. Minor discrepancy in the exact width of the stairs area/recess, but room counts and adjacencies are perfect.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture matches the layout well, including the specific bathroom fixture placements and double beds.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render; floor textures distinguish wet areas from bedrooms correctly.

detected_errors.description: The 'Recess' area near the stairs is simplified in the 3D geometry.

summary: An exceptional 3D conversion that maintains nearly perfect geometric fidelity to the architectural original while providing clear material and spatial definitions.
